item.title: Fold and Reduce in LINQ
item.description: In functional programming languages, there are several difference betwee them. I was quite interested in functional programming, even I spent some time to learn haskel and scala. I knew what I can use Select for map, not sure about folder and reduce FeatureFoldReduceInitial ValueRequires an initial value.Does not require an initial value.Function Signature(A, B) => A(A, A) => AApplicabilityCan be used on empty collections.Requires a non-empty collection.VariantsfoldLeft and foldRightreduceLeft and reduceRightStarting PointfoldLeft starts from the left.
